detailed_profile.name: Syed Waqas Qadri
detailed_profile.position: Finance head for WW Returns (Finance Manager) at Amazon
detailed_profile.about: I am a Pakistani national who has studied and worked locally and internationally. Currently situated and employed in Luxembourg at Amazon.com as Finance Manager responsible for financial reporting for Outbound Transportation for Europe, responsible for reverse logistics. I am currently working in the Online business sector; previous experiences include 2 years with FMCG industry and 1 year with Banking Industry. My responsibilities have revolved around regional finance, and I have worked with various international teams of Europe and Asia. My proficiencies include: Commercial Finance (Revenue target setting, value chain analysis, pricing, profitability analysis, system economics, SAP and SQL proficiency) Corporate Finance (Investment decision support, FCF-NWC analysis, ROIC analysis) Financial Planning (Revenue forecasting and modelling, management accounting, business risk analysis, rolling estimates and forecasting, financial statement analysis) Financial Reporting and Controlling (Executive reporting, controlling financials, KPI development & tracking) Trading (Fixed income securities & FX trading, derivative structure development)

detailed_profile.name: Roshni S Nair Jain
detailed_profile.position: Vice President, Yubi | Fintech, Lending & Payments | ML Models for Credit & Fraud Risk | Strategic Partnerships | Ex-Paytm | Featured in Top 10 Indian Women Leaders - Dubai 2023
detailed_profile.about: I am a seasoned fintech professional with over 22 years of experience in the digital payments industry, specialising in creating and delivering innovative solutions that leverage AI and ML to transform the Consumer lending for banks, LFIs, and other businesses. As the Vice President of AI Sales at Yubi, I lead the sales and pre-sales functions for our flagship product, Yuverse ( AI for lending ). A platform that enables seamless integration of ML risk models , Agentic AI , Gen AI solutions , payments and interactive digital experiences for customers across various industries. I am responsible for hunting and creating pipelines, driving sales and partnerships, negotiating and signing deals, and building long-term relationships with key stakeholders in the MENA region. I also focus on developing high-impact payment solutions that align with our partners' digital innovation goals and solve complex ecosystem challenges. Previously, I worked at Paytm, India's leading digital payment company, for over 13 years in a range of roles, including VP of Partnerships and Alliances, AVP of Business Development and Alliances for Paytm Travel, and Region Head for Paytm Brands. At Paytm, I built a successful online travel ticketing vertical, onboarded and managed hundreds of suppliers and merchants, and negotiated commercial deals with major partners. I also brought in high-performing, KPI-driven partnerships from banks and third-party brands as head of Partnerships and Alliances. In addition, I led a team of business development managers to drive pipeline and merchant closures, while developing pricing and offer strategies that contributed to consistent business growth. I have a strong product and technology background, with a master’s degree in software design and an advanced diploma in computer programming. I also hold an MBA with a focus on sales and marketing, along with an advanced certification in fintech and financial blockchain from IIM Calcutta. My core strengths include analytical thinking, customer relationship management, key account development, and technology/SaaS/CRM selling. I am passionate about using new-age technology and data to create value, drive digital transformation, and promote financial inclusion in the region. I was honoured to be featured among the Top 10 Indian Women Leaders in Dubai 2023 by WomenEntrepreneurIndia.

experience.description: •Driving Sales charter along with Pre-sales function of Digital Transformation including integration of Payments using AI and ML in the space of Credit & Risk and Digital Debt Collections for Banks , LFIs and other diverse industries.•Hunt and create pipeline to drive sales and partnerships for Enterprises /LFIs/Banks for Yubi’s platform solutions in MENA. •Constantly innovate and develop high impact payment & interactive digital solutions to align with the targets of digital Innovation of Partners using new age technology and also solves complex ecosystem problems related to payments. •Build partnerships with the local PSPs, Payment gateway providers , Acquirers to utilize in high efficiency solutions for Customer. •Work with PSPs and Customer to design and deliver Payment solution including workflows , MID , TID creations , inter charges / transaction rates & settlement journeys for reconciliation. •Understand the governance and risk management framework of Banks and plugging technology solutions that drive 100% compliance. •Closely working with Bank’s internal Marketing , IT & IS domains spocs for process clearance and taking the product prototype live. •Tracking performance & business analysis of projects that are live , track gaps and fix it with tech intervention & external partner platform fixes. •End to end management of all delivery of Partnerships/Projects including closing contracts develop system architecture / solution designing , settlement workflows, effective communication to Product designs, budgeting , resource management to deliver KPIs of the project and target high NPS score for Customers.•Create cost benefit value analysis , post delivery performance , ROIs , outcomes for all products for driving logical commercial discussions with Banks/LFIs.•Create pitch decks , run demonstration of the product to the Partners. •Received Award for the Fintech company of the year in November 2022 hosted by the Entrepreneur.
experience.description_html:
•Driving Sales charter along with Pre-sales function of Digital Transformation including integration of Payments using AI and ML in the space of Credit & Risk and Digital Debt Collections for Banks , LFIs and other diverse industries.
•Hunt and create pipeline to drive sales and partnerships for Enterprises /LFIs/Banks for Yubi’s platform solutions in MENA.
•Constantly innovate and develop high impact payment & interactive digital solutions to align with the targets of digital Innovation of Partners using new age technology and also solves complex ecosystem problems related to payments.
•Build partnerships with the local PSPs, Payment gateway providers , Acquirers to utilize in high efficiency solutions for Customer.
•Work with PSPs and Customer to design and deliver Payment solution including workflows , MID , TID creations , inter charges / transaction rates & settlement journeys for reconciliation.
•Understand the governance and risk management framework of Banks and plugging technology solutions that drive 100% compliance.
•Closely working with Bank’s internal Marketing , IT & IS domains spocs for process clearance and taking the product prototype live.
•Tracking performance & business analysis of projects that are live , track gaps and fix it with tech intervention & external partner platform fixes.
•End to end management of all delivery of Partnerships/Projects including closing contracts develop system architecture / solution designing , settlement workflows, effective communication to Product designs, budgeting , resource management to deliver KPIs of the project and target high NPS score for Customers.
•Create cost benefit value analysis , post delivery performance , ROIs , outcomes for all products for driving logical commercial discussions with Banks/LFIs.
•Create pitch decks , run demonstration of the product to the Partners.
•Received Award for the Fintech company of the year in November 2022 hosted by the Entrepreneur.

detailed_profile.position: Solutions Architect at Amazon Web Services | Cloud Optimization
detailed_profile.about: AWS Solutions Architect specializing in cloud optimization, with a proven track record of delivering efficient and cost-effective cloud solutions. I provide strategic guidance and best practices to AWS partners and customers, helping them optimize their cloud infrastructure. Previously as a Business Intelligence Engineer, I developed robust data-driven solutions and efficient data pipelines on AWS, delivering significant cost savings and productivity improvements. My background in business and financial planning has equipped me with strong stakeholder management and communication skills, enabling me to effectively bridge technical solutions with business objectives. Passionate about continuous learning and knowledge sharing, I hold multiple cloud certifications and actively contribute to the technical community. My analytical foundation is built on both Bachelor's and Master's degrees in Industrial Engineering, complementing my technical expertise with strong problem-solving capabilities.

posts.title: A day in the life of a Technical Program Manager

experience.title: Senior Technical Program Manager
experience.description: •Senior Technical Program Manager at Grab which is the leading ride -hailing and mobile payments super app in South East Asia.•Leading projects related to Lending and Digital Banking including GrabPay and Pay Later across all Southeast Asian countries.•Working on building and adding new products to Grab Financial group including Lending and other financial services for Drivers,Passengers and Merchants.• Coordinate and manage technical project and program development of large-scale, distributed software applications, systems throughout the complete software development lifecycle, from design through release.•Working with product management to define strategy and requirements, identifying and securing commitment from teams across the company for new initiatives, driving consensus on the technical approach, setting timelines, and leading cross-functional development teams from design through delivery.•Create schedules, identify and communicate risks to stakeholders, define risk mitigation strategies, and facilitate appropriate software engineering solutions.•Anticipate bottlenecks, provide escalation management and balance the business needs versus technical constraints.• Performing the role of Agile Coach and training Scrum Masters for multiple teams.
experience.description_html:
•Senior Technical Program Manager at Grab which is the leading ride -hailing and mobile payments super app in South East Asia.
•Leading projects related to Lending and Digital Banking including GrabPay and Pay Later across all Southeast Asian countries.
•Working on building and adding new products to Grab Financial group including Lending and other financial services for Drivers,Passengers and Merchants.
• Coordinate and manage technical project and program development of large-scale, distributed software applications, systems throughout the complete software development lifecycle, from design through release.
•Working with product management to define strategy and requirements, identifying and securing commitment from teams across the company for new initiatives, driving consensus on the technical approach, setting timelines, and leading cross-functional development teams from design through delivery.
•Create schedules, identify and communicate risks to stakeholders, define risk mitigation strategies, and facilitate appropriate software engineering solutions.
•Anticipate bottlenecks, provide escalation management and balance the business needs versus technical constraints.
• Performing the role of Agile Coach and training Scrum Masters for multiple teams.

recommendations: Viviann T. “At Uber, Gaurav stood out to me, for his exceptional work as our Technical Program Manager on the complex Uber Money wallet project in the UK. His professionalism, technical expertise, and dedication were key to this challenging project's success. It's also a pleasure to work with Gaurav because he's always approachable, responsive, and adept at juggling many conflicting components. From anticipating challenges to seamless collaboration and transparent reporting, Gaurav's contributions were invaluable to the Uber Money launch in UK. Would be more than happy to work with him again in the future.”

Shubham Paul “Gaurav and I have been working together for almost a year now and I can vouch for his professionalism and effectiveness. Each time I work with Gaurav on a project I know we are getting accurate and useful information that would help us create an efficient data package. He is also diligent about staying up to date with all the information about the data we use to deliver to our clients, whether it's property data, ratings data or any banking data. He is a reliable analyst who stands by his projections and capable of delivering any type of report. Therefore he is one of the most valuable assets to our product team.”

projects.title: XpressFeed

My role also involves dealing with client issues and facing external clients directly.We adhere to Agile methodology and my role involves being the Scrum Master for my team

projects.title: Effective logging solution using NO SQL(Cassandra)
projects.description: we did a POC to study about various NO SQL databses available . we did a comparison of Hbase, Mongo db and cassandra. finally we decided to go with Cassandra integrated with hadoop for analytics
